400.name: BAD_REQUEST
400.message: At least one parameter is invalid or missing. See err.error_data for more details.

401.name: UNAUTHORIZED
401.message: We could not authenticate the request. Please review your credentials and authentication method.

404.name: NOT_FOUND
404.message: The requested resource could not be located.

409.name: CONFLICT
409.message: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.

422.name: UNPROCESSABLE_ENTITY
422.message: The request was good, but nevertheless could not be processed. A common cause of this error is insufficient funds.

429.name: TOO_MANY_REQUESTS
429.message: Too many requests have been received per sec. Permitted rate is 50 requests/sec
